issue.title: Gazebo 6 conflicts with rviz because of ogre 1.8/1.9 dependency on Ubuntu

message.raw:
We agree on keeping the change of libogre-1.8-dev for gazebo6 but remember not to change dependencies once a major version is released.

`gazebo6 6.1.0-2` is already in the repo depending on ogre-1.8, so it should be able to be installed with RVIZ.
message.html:
We agree on keeping the change of libogre-1.8-dev for gazebo6 but remember not to change dependencies once a major version is released.

gazebo6 6.1.0-2 is already in the repo depending on ogre-1.8, so it should be able to be installed with RVIZ.
